data.actual_result: The badge has disappeared and you need to turn it off and on to make it show again
data.expected_result: The unread message badge should still be displayed
data.short_description: Unread message badge disappears after minimizing discord to tray
data.steps_to_repro: - Have the unread message badge enabled, and have the close button minimize discord to tray - Click the close button - Open up Discord from tray again
